pageProduct.name: Antipodes Baptise H20 Ultra Hydrating Water Gel Moisturiser 60ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Baptise H20 Ultra-Hydrating Water Gel is a weightless, intensive formula to immerse thirsty skin in pure, natural moisture. A water-based serum to help quench thirsty and dry skin.

Warnings

EXTERNAL APPLICATION ONLY. PATCH TEST PRIOR TO USE.

Common Uses

Plant-based hyaluronic acid works with New Zealand manuka honey and harakeke gel to deeply moisturise skin. . Skin cells need water to stay healthy and strong so delivering pure hydration in a water-based serum daily grants your skin an immediate water boost.

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), glycerine, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer & Lecithin, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Polysorbate 20, Hyaluronic Acid ( plant based), Sodium Citrate, Glycerin, Water, Alcohol Denat, Terminalia Ferdinandiana Fruit Extract, Lysolecithin, Sclerotium Gum, Xanthan Gum, Pullulan, Phormium Tenax (Harakeke) Extract, Hibiscus sabdariffa (Hibiscus) Flower Extract, Leptospermum scoparium mel (manuka) honey, Cyathea Medullaris (mamaku) Extract, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Aloe barbadensis* (Aloe Vera) Leaf Extract, Rose Anatolia (Cosmetic Grade Oil, Parfum), Vegetone Rich Red T2/Lycopene Red W/S.
INGREDIENTS: Lavandula angustifolia (lavender) hydrosol*, Aqua (Waiwera®) water, Naticide® (parfum), Cyathea medullaris (mamaku black fern) leaf extract, xanthan gum, caprylyl/capryl glucoside, Vitis vinifera (Vinanza® Grape) seed extract. fragrance of French rose and cardamon: citral†, citronellol†, d-Limonene†, farnesol†, geraniol†, linalool†.

Directions

Apply reverently at dawn and dusk, to quench the thirsty skin of your face, neck and décolletage. : Apply to your face, neck and décolletage before your favourite Antipodes® face oil or moisturiser. Use daily for immediate hydration and the best long-term results.
